description:
4.5+ Rating, TechCrunch, Mashable, NYTimes and others are raving about Runtastic... Find out why & download Runtastic Mountain Bike today!

Turn your iPhone into the perfect bike computer with incredible features and the most accurate elevation calculation in the App Store. Whether your track is a lap around the house or the deepest mountain trail, the Runtastic Mountain Bike app is your ideal biking companion.


TOP APP FEATURES AND BENEFITS (limited features in LITE version):

- Tracking & History Stats: Mtb performance data – time, distance, speed, elevation, calories
- LIVE Tracking: Track your route (map location) in real time to share trails with all your best friends
- Voice Coach: Announces performance stats & motivational messages, available in numerous languages
- Music: Create a playlist for your trek & activate your best Power Song for extra motivation
- Take Pictures: Photos are saved with your mtb trek overview and ride stats
- Route Search: Ride thousands of mountainbike & free style routes, search available in-app & on Runtastic.com
- Dashboard Configuration: Displays all preferred biking statistics
- Configurable Maps: Google Maps and Open Cycle Map
- Offline Maps: For off track and downhill trails in areas without GSM coverage
- Colored Traces: Track biking pace, speed, grade, elevation & heart rate
- Interval Splits: Analysis and table view from each part of your mountainbike trek
- Current rate of climb, followed by detailed post-ride data on time rode uphill, downhill, flat
- Automatic pause detection during your trek or interval training using ANT+ sensors
- Weather & wind statistics
- Cadence measurement with the Runtastic Speed & Cadence Sensor
- Heart rate measurement (with additional hardware)
- Users are encouraged to save all mountainbike & downhill sessions on Runtastic.com
- Share your biking activities & accomplishments on Facebook, Google+, Twitter & via E-mail
*** Features & benefits limited in lite version


COMPATIBLE HARDWARE:

- Runtastic Speed & Cadence Sensor (Bluetooth Low Energy)
- Runtastic Bike Case for iPhone + accessories
- Runtastic Sports Armband + accessories
- Various Runtastic heart rate monitors


Mountain biking is the perfect mix of exercise, adventure, fresh air & beautiful landscapes. Bike where the road leads you, without losing orientation. It makes no difference whether you’re a beginner or you’re training for the Olympic Games, the Runtastic Mountain Bike app gives you everything that you as a mountain biker could have ever wished. Download the app and join our incredible community of active, sport enthusiasts today!

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
trackCensoredName: Runtastic Mountain Bike GPS Cycling Computer, Ride and Route Tracker

releaseNotes:
- Optimized for the latest iOS

Enjoy the latest version of our app! We look forward to your helpful reviews in the App Store!
